sarah.name: Sarah Johnson
sarah.content: PPTKING has completely transformed our workflow. The AI-generated presentations exceed expectations and save us tremendous time.

michael.name: Michael Chen
michael.content: The template library is incredibly rich with modern design styles that perfectly match our company's brand identity.

emma.name: Emma Rodriguez
emma.content: Upgraded from free to pro version - powerful features at reasonable prices. Highly recommended for all entrepreneurs.
